alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:40PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BENNETT COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM MDT... At 739 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Swett to 7 miles east of Batesland to 8 miles west of Merriman. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Swett around 745 PM MDT. Southwestern Lacreek Wildlife Refuge around 800 PM MDT. Martin and LaCreek North Housing around 805 PM MDT. Sunrise Housing around 810 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include southeastern Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
